div.div: How to choose your first board

The Corne keyboard is a split keyboard with 3x6 column staggered keys and 3 thumb keys, based on
Helix. Crkbd stands for Corne Keyboard.
How to choose your first board

div.p: Until you see an Atreus in person, it's hard to comprehend just how compact it is.

h2.span: How to choose your first board

li.span: Figure out what are your needs.
Find board suitable to your needs.
Print layouts and try them to see if they are comfortable.
Either make it yourself or order if it is a possibility.
Exercise to get comfortable with new layout.

div.section: There are many different layouts to choose from for your future comfort.

div.p: The Corne keyboard is a split keyboard with 3x6 column staggered keys and 3 thumb keys, based on Helix. Crkbd stands for Corne Keyboard.

h2.span: How to choose your first board

li.span: Figure out what are your needs.
Find board suitable to your needs.
Print layouts and try them to see if they are comfortable.
Either make it yourself or order if it is a possibility.
